text.div:
STEC Infection (Tests for STEC , E. coli O157, or Shiga Toxin [Verotoxin] Antibody)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    22608-4 Escherichia coli verotoxin 1 Ab [Titer] in Stool
    22609-2 Escherichia coli verotoxin 2 Ab [Titer] in Stool
    31381-7 Escherichia coli verotoxin 1 Ab [Units/volume] in Stool
    31382-5 Escherichia coli verotoxin 2 Ab [Units/volume] in Stool
    35878-8 Escherichia coli O157:H7 IgM Ab [Units/volume] in Serum
    35879-6 Escherichia coli O157:H7 IgG Ab [Units/volume] in Serum
    6575-5 Escherichia coli verotoxin 1 Ab [Titer] in Stool by Neutralization test
    6577-1 Escherichia coli verotoxin 2 Ab [Titer] in Stool by Neutralization test
